title: CSVResponseWriter does not honor fl globs
description: The fl query parameter is not honored by the CSVResponseWriter when it has globs, e.g., fl=foo* will return all fields in the document.

comments.author: Keith Fligg
comments.content: Fix and unit test patches attached.

comments.author: Hoss Man
